column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The rest of the meal and evening - excellent
column2: attentive (but not overbearing) service. The shrimp cocktail was very good
column3: and the thick-cut bacon side dish was melt in your mouth. The roasted tomatoes were also very good. We capped off the meal with the chocolate cream pie
column4: which one of the hostesses told me when I came in was "life-changing". It came pretty close to matching that description.
